# How to cite AI-Riksarkivet

If you have used the AI Lab's resources or need to refer to the AI Lab at the Swedish National Archives in your research, please use the following reference:

**[Main citation to be added when you have a primary publication]**

Example format:
> Author1, A., Author2, B., Author3, C., et al. (2025). [Title of your main publication about AI-Riksarkivet]. *Journal Name*, Volume(Issue), pages. https://doi.org/[DOI]

Or for BibTeX:

```bibtex
@article{AIRiksarkivet2025,
    author = {[List of authors]},
    title = {[Title of your main publication]},
    journal = {[Journal Name]},
    volume = {[Volume]},
    number = {[Issue]},
    year = {2024},
    issn = {[ISSN]},
    pages = {[page range]},
    doi = {[DOI]},
    url = {[URL]}
}
```

## Acknowledgements

If your project has been based at the AI Lab, please use the following formulation in any related publications:

> "Computational resources and support for this research was provided by AI-Riksarkivet (the AI Lab) at the Swedish National Archives."

## References for AI Lab Resources

Our AI Lab develops and maintains various digital resources. Here's how to properly reference them in your academic work:

### Machine Learning Models

For models hosted on our Hugging Face hub (https://huggingface.co/Riksarkivet):

```bibtex
@online{aira_ml_[identifier],
    organization = {{Swedish National Archives AI Lab}},
    title = {[Model designation]},
    date = {[Release year]},
    url = {https://huggingface.co/Riksarkivet/[identifier]},
    note = {Machine learning model}
}
```

### Research Datasets

Reference our curated datasets using:

```bibtex
@misc{aira_data_[identifier],
    institution = {{AI-Riksarkivet}},
    title = {[Dataset description]},
    year = {[Publication year]},
    howpublished = {[Access point or repository]},
    note = {Research dataset}
}
```

### Open Source Tools

When referencing our GitHub projects:

```bibtex
@software{aira_tool_[identifier],
    organization = {{AI Lab, Swedish National Archives}},
    title = {[Tool name]},
    year = {[Release year]},
    url = {https://github.com/AI-Riksarkivet/[project]},
    version = {[Version number if applicable]}
}
```
